title: North Berwick
name: Tantallon Castle
directions: Take [http://www.eveinfo.co.uk/images/pdfs/service-timetables-120.pdf Eves Coaches 120] from corner High Street/Quality Street, runs every 2 hours, no service on Sundays. Distance to town center about 5km
hours: Apr-Sep: daily 09:30-17:30. Oct-Mar: daily 09:30-16:30. Last admission 30 min before closing time
content: A 14th Century fortress, spectacularly located on a clifftop promontory 3 miles to the south of the town.
